item.title: [c21] Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
item.description:
Land

Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G}.

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [c21] Novijen, Heart of Progress
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{G}{U}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [c21] Mosswort Bridge
item.description:
Land

Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

{T}: Add {G}.

{G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

item.title: [c21] Lumbering Falls
item.description:
Land

Lumbering Falls enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

{2}{G}{U}: Lumbering Falls becomes a 3/3 green and blue Elemental creature with hexproof until end of turn. It's still a land.

item.title: [c21] Yavimaya Coast
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Tranquil Thicket
item.description:
Land

Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G}.

Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Healing Technique
item.description:
Sorcery

Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.)

Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain life equal to that card's mana value. Exile Healing Technique.

item.title: [c21] Blossoming Bogbeast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Whenever attacks, you gain 2 life. Then creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

https://twitter.com/BengineeringTV/status/1380641003321745410

item.title: [c21] Ezraroot Channeler
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk Druid

Reach

Creature spells you cast cost {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

{T}: You gain 2 life.

item.title: [c21] Stinging Study
item.description:
Instant

You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

item.title: [c21] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [c21] Aetherspouts
item.description:
Instant

For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

item.title: [c21] Aether Gale
item.description:
Sorcery

Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

item.title: [c21] Mind's Desire
item.description:
Sorcery

Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [c21] Metallurgic Summonings
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

{3}{U}{U}, Exile Metallurgic Summonings: Return all instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you control six or more artifacts.

item.title: [c21] Living Lore
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

As Living Lore enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.

Living Lore's power and toughness are each equal to the exiled card's converted mana cost.

Whenever Living Lore deals combat damage, you may sacrifice it. If you do, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Diluvian Primordial
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Flying

When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [c21] Dig Through Time
item.description:
Instant

Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [c21] Talrand, Sky Summoner
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Merfolk Wizard

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

item.title: [c21] Swarm Intelligence
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [c21] Serum Visions
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card. Scry 2.

item.title: [c21] Ponder
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.

Draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Naru Meha, Master Wizard
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Naru Meha, Master Wizard enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Other Wizards you control get +1/+1.

item.title: [c21] Treasure Cruise
item.description:
Sorcery

Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

Draw three cards.

item.title: [c21] Traumatic Visions
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

item.title: [c21] Brass's Bounty
item.description:
Sorcery

For each land you control, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [c21] Blasphemous Act
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.

Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

item.title: [c21] Apex of Power
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.

If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.

item.title: [c21] Fiery Fall
item.description:
Instant

Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.

Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

item.title: [c21] Etali, Primal Storm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dinosaur

Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.

item.title: [c21] Erratic Cyclops
item.description:
Creature — Cyclops Shaman

Trample

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Dualcaster Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [c21] Charmbreaker Devils
item.description:
Creature — Devil

At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Sunbird's Invocation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a spell with converted mana cost X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [c21] Seething Song
item.description:
Instant

Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

item.title: [c21] Mana Geyser
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.

item.title: [c21] Jaya Ballard
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Jaya

+1: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.

+1: Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards.

−8: You get an emblem with "You may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead."

item.title: [c21] Humble Defector
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.

item.title: [c21] Wildfire Devils
item.description:
Creature — Devil

When Wildfire Devils enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Volcanic Vision
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

item.title: [c21] Call the Skybreaker
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying.

Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

item.title: [c21] Crackling Drake
item.description:
Creature — Drake

Flying

Crackling Drake's power is equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

When Crackling Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Pyromancer's Goggles
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{T}: Add {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [c21] Izzet Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{R}.

item.title: [c21] Epic Experiment
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

item.title: [c21] Talisman of Creativity
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Talisman of Creativity deals 1 damage to you.

item.description:
Land

Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.

When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {U}{R}.
